attributes.action: Support and urge the President of The Czech Republic Vaclav Klaus not to ratify The Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people have been denied a referendum on whether or no the Lisbon Treaty should be ratified. The people of all other European nations have held referendums. We urge HM Governmet to support the President of the Czech Republic in refusing to ratify the
is treaty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
